suite.name: Update

test.name: Deve poder marcar uma tarefa como concluida

kw.name: New Browser
kw.doc: Create a new playwright Browser with specified options.
kw.msg: {"browser": "chromium", "headless": false, "chromiumSandbox": false, "devtools": false, "handleSIGHUP": true, "handleSIGINT": true, "handleSIGTERM": true, "slowMo": 0.0, "timeout": 30000.0, "tracesDir": "C:\\qax\\projects\\mark85_robot_express\\tests\\tasks\\results\\browser\\traces\\a2530d7a-fb79-427b-8889-9eb500639b09"}

kw.name: New Page
kw.doc: Open a new Page.
kw.msg: Successfully initialized new page object and opened url: http://localhost:3000
No context was open. New context was automatically opened when this page is created.

kw.name: Load Json From File
kw.doc: Load JSON from file.
kw.msg: ${data} = {'create': {'user': {'name': 'Steve Jobs', 'email': 'jobs@apple.com', 'password': 'pwd123'}, 'tasks': {'name': 'Criar uma nova versão do ipod', 'tags': ['ios', 'music', 'ipod']}}, 'duplicate': {'user'...

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST
kw.doc: Sends a POST request.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:3333/sessions path_url=/sessions headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.27.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '49', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"email": "tony@stark.com", "password": "pwd123"}'

kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Test Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current test.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'tony@stark.com' in the given field.

kw.name: Fill Text
kw.doc: Clears and fills the given ``txt`` into the text field found by ``selector``.
kw.msg: Fills the text 'pwd123' in the given field.

kw.name: Click
kw.doc: Simulates mouse click on the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Split String
kw.doc: Splits the ``string`` using ``separator`` as a delimiter string.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Wait For Elements State
kw.doc: Waits for the element found by ``selector`` to satisfy state option.
kw.msg: Waited for Element with selector css=header .right small at state visible

kw.name: Get Text
kw.doc: Returns text attribute of the element found by ``selector``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.
